result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

records.descr: DE not competent to stand trial, case suspended

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Anthony Jerome Love.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for continued competency hearing (PM Session).  Competency hearing proceeded with continued testimony by Doctor Thomas DeBoer.  State and Defense rest.  Closing arguments heard.  Court states findings.  Court finds the defendant lacks substantial capacity to understand court proceedings or to assist in his own defense.  Court orders proceedings suspended.   Court ordered defendant committed to the Department of Health Services.  The Court does not authorize involuntary medication at this time.  Order of Commitment for Treatment signed and filed.  Court ordered defendant transported FORTHWTIH.
Case adjourned for Return of Doctor's Report in Branch 36, Rm 316 SB.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Anthony Jerome Love.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a competency hearing (AM Session).  Parties are prepared to proceed.  Sworn for the State: Doctor Thomas DeBoer (Examining Psychologist).  Exhibit 1 received.  Due to time constraints, Court passed this matter to 1:30 PM. Case adjourned to Branch 36, Rm 316 SB.
Court is advised of unavailability of Dr. DeBoer for today's scheduled competency hearing. Competency hearing is rescheduled to 9/15/22 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Anthony Jerome Love.  Prosecuting attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for the State of Wisconsin. Doctor's report filed and reviewed. Defense is requesting a hearing. Case is adjourned in Branch 36.
Competency hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed.
Received and Filed.
Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court orders Defendant be transported to Mendota for compentency examination. The sheriff shall arrange for transportation of the defendant to the treatment facility FORTHWITH.  Court ordered case adjourned for return on doctor's report on 8/31/22 at 8:30.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 608 of the Courthouse.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Order of Commitment for Treatment (Incompetency)
filed.
filed.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Anthony Jerome Love not in court, in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
Case set for Doctor's Report Return.  Parties request an adjournment. For reasons presented to the Court. Case adjourned, branch 38.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM. Case set for Doctor's Report Return. Defendant has not cooperated with the examiner. Court advised him to cooperate and adjourned the matter. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Anthony Jerome Love not in court, in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:15 am.
filed.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Anthony Jerome Love not in court, in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW  
Case set for Scheduling Conference. Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause, suspended proceedings, and ordered defendant examined by the Wisconsin Forensic Unit. Order for Examination, signed and filed. Court ordered the defendant remanded. Court ordered case is adjourned, Branch 38.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court, via zoom, with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW  
CASE HELD VIA  ZOOM. Case set for Arraignment. Defense motion to dismiss argued.  Amended Information e-filed.  Defense acknowledges receipt of the Information, waives reading and enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant. Defense request case set for a scheduling. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont; both appear by video.  Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer C. Boyack. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy. Defense finds an error in the information. Matter is set for arraignment. Defense to be heard on bail on the next date.  Case is adjourned to Branch 38.  Arraignment scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 08:15 am.
received and filed.

Court ordered no contact with FSQ
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.   No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.   No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Anthony Jerome Love in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing. Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
